caption.title: Effective reproduction number of the rubella epidemic from 2012 to 2013, Japan.
caption.p: The posterior mean (continuous line) and 95% credible intervals (CrI; dashed lines) are shown. Black bars represent group 1, i.e., Tokyo and adjacent prefectures, while white bars represent group 2, i.e., Osaka and adjacent prefectures. Monte Carlo particles yielded by the chain with annealing temperature 32 are used for obtaining these estimates. Day 0 is 2 January 2012.
